title: The Jericho
description: As mankind flees the ruins of Earth, everyone knows survival won't be easy. Major Nazario expects danger. His team expects hardships and hunger. What no one expects is a dragon and a horde full of angry orcs...Nazario is stranded on board one of Earth's last ships. With no time to process the pain of losing his home, he is charged with finding sanctuary for his people before they perish on their failing colony ship.What he finds is even an alien paradise full of magical life straight out of fantasy. But their salvation is threatened. War is coming to destroy their new home. And the people still stranded in space struggle to handle their impending doom.Now Nazario must end an all-consuming war in order to save the remnants of humanity before they tear themselves apart, trapped on board the Jericho...
author: Ryan  Rodriguez
